name: Sierra Executive Suite | 1 King
description: 820-square foot one-bedroom suite perfect for a getaway, featuring a living room with dining table, bar, and two flat-screen televisions. The separate bedroom has a king-size bed and can be closed off from the living area, with a circular wet bar and mini-refrigerator. Ideal for entertaining small parties.
shortDescription: 820 sq ft one-bedroom suite with separate living room, dining area, and circular wet bar.

meta.title: Sierra Executive Suite 1 King – Eldorado Reno | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Book the Sierra Executive Suite at Eldorado Reno – 820 sq ft one-bedroom suite with separate living room and wet bar.

testimonials.quote: Sierra Executive Suite | 1 King was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Tom P.

testimonials.quote: Visited Sierra Executive Suite | 1 King during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
testimonials.author: Nick M.
testimonials.meta: Yelp · date night during golf trip
